meta_title: What Is ROA? Definition & Importance for Industrial Assets
meta_description: Return on Assets (ROA) measures how efficiently industrial firms use equipment to generate profit. Understand the formula and its role in maintenance strategy.
title: What Is ROA (Return on Assets)?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is ROA (Return on Assets)?

image_prompt: A high-angle, professional photograph of a clean, modern automated manufacturing floor. In the foreground, a maintenance manager in high-visibility PPE and a hard hat is reviewing a tablet showing green performance charts. In the background, robotic arms and conveyor systems are in motion. The lighting is bright and industrial, emphasizing a high-tech, efficient production environment. No text or overlays.
